WRITING.TEXT: I do when I'm fighting bosses or mini bosses, if I can get it off, if I can't, I stasis them and do it. Only if i have the guredo divine ability available though.

As far as I can tell, you missed an Igneo Talus in the death mountain area.
Other than that, really appreciate this post!
Yeah, I was causally snowling while watching a movie and walked away with 10k after about an hour.

Not really, I just want more land to explore even though I still have 40 shrines I need to find so I still have lots of exploring to do. My buddy wants to see a story line where you play as Zelda from 100 years ago.
Map expansion. I feel like i should be able to go north and west more.
Yeah that's what I meant when I said a new account. Been enjoying just running around with max stamina to really want to start again yet though.

Not sure how many hours I've put into it, but I'm going to keep this same save file. I'll create a new account if I want to start again. Reason I want to keep it is to finish everything I possibly can, with the exception of 900 korok seeds, before the dlc comes out.
After beating him you also get a percent completion that, I believe, can be viewed on your map screen.

Ive had this happen a lot as well. But I also have it downloaded through steam. And when I run MS through steam it usually works more often than the nexon launcher. Not sure if that has anything to do with it, or if it's because both copies or downloaded on to 2 different HDDs.

Okay that's good to know. I guess I'll just do it with a party. Thanks for all the help. Shouldn't have any more questions but if there is any interesting or helpful tidbits you guys know about arcane river I wouldn't mind having a bit more knowledge of it.
What about soloing it? Would I get more exp that way or would be it better just to do it with people? Sorry for all the questions, just trying to figure this arcane shit out.
Is it the same as the first section where you have to complete the main quests to do the PQ? Also, how hard is hard mode if you only have 50 arc? Because you get 5 per PQ on hard, correct?

I actually to 2 MapleStorys downloaded. One through the nexon launcher and the other through steam. I find the one from Steam works more than the launcher one. Not sure if they are both installed ti my different HDs or not.

WRITING.TITLE: Arcane River
WRITING.TEXT:
Well about a week ago I finally got back onto MS after being off for about 6 months just recently finished getting 5th job on my 210 NL. I only have 40 arcane power, will have 50 after today's dailies. After the dailies Im slowly working through Chu Chu island but it's a little slow with 40/100 Arc. I feel like I'm missing something..or is it this slow to gaining arc?
Is there a faster way to gain arcane stones? Haven't even found any from mobs. Is there a certain mob that has a better chance to drop them? Or nodestones. I've only found like 4 NL applicable nodestones and 2 that were for other classes.
How long did it take you to reach Atleast 100 arcane power?

There we go.. http://i.imgur.com/CegBibn.jpg

Can you link to the new info?
That's more my speed. Will post mine once I get home. I haven't used alt or space to jump. Mine jump is X
